practical_performance.name: Practical Performance (PP)
practical_performance.description: A practical Performance (PP) assessment will provide direct evidence of whether candidates have acquired the competency for the ability statements by solving a scenario-based problem.
practical_performance.focus: The Practical Performance (PP) assessment focuses on providing authentic "Show Me Application" evidence of candidates' ability to apply Azure cloud computing skills to solve real-world scenarios.
tasks: Candidates will complete a series of practical tasks that demonstrate their ability to assess, implement, and review Azure cloud solutions.

evidence.LO1: Candidates will configure Azure resources based on given specifications to demonstrate their understanding of assessing cloud solutions and specifications for Azure.
evidence.LO2: Candidates will deploy a sample application on Azure, showcasing their ability to develop an implementation plan for Azure cloud computing.
evidence.LO3: Candidates will use Azure monitoring tools to identify and resolve issues, demonstrating their ability to develop review processes for Azure cloud computing implementation issues.

submission: Candidates will submit screenshots, configuration files, and reports documenting their actions and outcomes for each task.
This includes evidence of the configurations made, deployment processes, and troubleshooting steps taken.
practical_performance.retention_period: All submitted evidence, including screenshots, configuration files, reports, and assessment records, will be retained for 3 years to ensure compliance with institutional policies and for auditing purposes.
